content:
I’m a senior at Macalester College studying statistics with minors in geography and creative writing. Right now, I’m excited about spatial data, public transit, and creating reproducible research and R resources. This year, I’m working at Metro Transit as a data science intern. I love being in the public sector doing work that benefits my community!
Over the summer, I’ve been studying for the GRE and preparing for the honors thesis I’ll be completing this year. I’ve learned a lot about transit and mobility and I’m excited to apply what I’ve learned to work I’ve already started on spatial accessibility. Aside from statistics, I love running, poetry, reading, and rock climbing!

title: Raven McKnight
